overview: The story centers on the classic struggle of good over evil putting down-on-his-luck musician Charlie Brechtelagainst the Devil, who uses manipulations, evil agents and even a touch of voodoo to gain possession of Charlie's soul. It all culiminates with a motorcycle race on a lonely road in Angels Camp, California, as the Devil puts everything on the line in a final attempt to win Charlie's soul.
title: Rebel on the Highway
